DOC.brief_summary: A new tablet form of PF-04531083 has been manufactured. Previously the compound was administered as a solution/suspension to healthy volunteers. This study will investigate the pharmacokinetics of PF-044531083 in tablet form and compare with the pharmacokinetics obtained, with the same dosing regimen, with the solution/suspension.
DOC.brief_title: A Study To Observe The Performance Of A Tablet Form Of PF-04531083 As Evidenced By The Concentration Of PF-04531083 In The Blood With Time Following Oral Administration To Healthy Volunteers.
DOC.criteria: Young Healthy volunteers Elderly volunteers Patients with any existing medical conditions considered likely to impinge on study execution
